item.title: About Me
item.description: Who Is Thomas Johander? I’m a software engineer working in a large, Fortune 50 enterprise. I work on a team that maintains an ever-growing portfolio of mircoservices, mostly REST APIs. The tech stack I work with day-to-day includes: Spring Boot Kotlin Groovy Spock Testing Framework Gradle Spring Web Flux MongoDB Kafka Elasticsearch Why I Created This Blog I came to coding by way of a (amazing) Full Stack Javascript Bootcamp.
